Unfortunately my panel will not always be in the optimal position since I am investigating different scenarios:  - always in an optimal position, full scope of movement on an actuator. - only allowed to rotate along its vertical axis - only allowed to rotate along its horizontal axis We are looking at price/feasibility of an actuated system like that as compared to actual yield or improvement in yield in kWh per year to see if its justified to invest into it. 
Yes, my location is in Dubai so pretty much a desert climate.  Here's my approach to do a brute force study like you suggested. Thoughts?
